multiplechoiceresponse.label: What is the difference between a text file and a binary file?
multiplechoiceresponse.description: You can add an optional tip or note related to the prompt like this.

choicegroup.choice: Text files contain human-readable text, while binary files contain non-human-readable data.
Text files are smaller than binary files.
Binary files are faster to read and write than text files.
There is no difference between text files and binary files.
